seniority_level.evidence: Minimum 3 years experience required, title is 'Data Engineer' without senior/staff designation, typical mid-level for BI/DW roles in India

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Data Engineer', responsibilities focus on BI reporting, ETL, and data integration

sub_specialty.evidence: Focus on BI/DW projects, reporting/visualization, ETL/Data Integration tools (DataStage, ADF, Informatica) - all batch-oriented

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of team leadership, mentoring, or people management; responsibilities are individual contributor focused

primary_cloud.evidence: Nice-to-have skills include AWS, Google Cloud, and Azure - no single cloud specified as primary

secondary_clouds.evidence: All three major clouds listed as preferred experience, suggesting multi-cloud environment

processing_paradigm.evidence: Focus on BI reporting, ETL tools, and data warehousing - all batch processing paradigms

orchestrator_category.evidence: Azure Data Factory mentioned as preferred tool, which is cloud-native orchestration

storage_layer.evidence: BI/DW focus implies data warehouse architecture; Cognos reporting typically connects to warehouses

remote_restriction.evidence: Location specified as Pune, Maharashtra, India with onsite work model

relocation_required.evidence: Onsite work model in Pune, India implies relocation may be required for non-local candidates

h1b_friendly.evidence: Location in India, no mention of visa sponsorship; IBM India typically hires locally

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: Based in India, no mention of student visa support; OPT/CPT are US-specific programs

citizenship_required.evidence: Location in India implies authorization to work in India is required, no citizenship requirement stated

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time permanent position in India typically corresponds to W2 equivalent employment

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits mentioned in job posting or extraction results

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No explicit career path mentioned, but IBM Consulting context implies growth opportunities

mentorship_signals.evidence: Mentions working with business and technical team members, suggesting collaborative environment

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No mention of promotions or advancement paths in job description

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers or role changes

career_tracks_available.evidence: No specific career tracks mentioned, though IBM typically has IC and management tracks

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear must-haves (Cognos, UNIX, 3+ years) vs nice-to-haves (cloud platforms, ETL tools)

scope_definition.evidence: Focused on BI reporting, ETL, and data integration with specific tool requirements

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: 3 years experience required for mid-level BI Data Engineer role is reasonable
